akn:section.akn:heading: Nationality lost solely from performance of acts or fulfillment of conditions

akn:content.akn:p: § 1488. Nationality lost solely from performance of acts or fulfillment of conditions The loss of nationality under this part shall result solely from the performance by a national of the acts or fulfillment of the conditions specified in this part. (June 27, 1952, ch. 477, title III, ch. 3, § 356, 66 Stat. 272.)
